DOC.detailed_description: Patient evaluation : - Physical examination , questionary Constant score : Pain ( severe , moderate , mild , non ) , activity level ( sleep affected/sport limitations/daily live limitations/arm positioning ) range motion ( forward flexion/lateral elevation , internal external rotation ) . - Radiologic examination : Axial view , Axillary view Anterior posterior view- evaluate level osteoarthritis Kellgren Lawrence score Samilson score .
